= How to log the baseband in realtime. =

From SSH (or terminal) issue these commands:

{{{
rm /dev/console
mknod /dev/console c 4 0
kill -USR1 `ps jax|grep omm|grep ys|cut -d ' ' -f 4`
}}}

Optionally you can also add:

{{{
kill -HUP `ps jax|grep omm|grep ys|cut -d ' ' -f 4`
}}}

== How to stop the log. ==

{{{
rm /dev/console
mknod /dev/console c 4 0
kill -HUP `ps jax|grep omm|grep ys|cut -d ' ' -f 4`
}}}
